title.plainText: I help companies build products with

bio: Hello! My name is <0>Florencia Luz Duarte</0>. I am a Front-end Developer and Product Designer based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

texts.text1: After working for 10+ years as a Designer, <0>I decided to give coding a chance, and it ended up stealing my heart</0>.
texts.text2: Since then, <0>I have been in the process of career change</0>, which has led me to self-learn the necessary skills to become a Front-end Developer.
texts.text3: Currently, <0>my mission is to act as a bridge between the worlds of Programming and Design</0>, leveraging both aspects of my professional journey.
